articles.title: Meta, Google Android Defect Revealed User Information, Suit Says
articles.description: Meta Platforms and Alphabet Inc have been sued over Android vulnerabilities that allowed the Facebook operator and a Russian company to deanonymize users, according to a proposed class action.

articles.description: Peter Brooks, 61, was found guilty of attempted murder, attempted arson, and possession of a bladed article in April.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pakistan’s Economic Survey Paints a Rosy Picture, But Reality Tells a Harsher Tale
articles.description: The highlight of the survey is a projected GDP growth rate of 2.7% for 2025. Finance Minister Aurangzeb claims the economy is now on a “gradual path to recovery”. However, Pakistani people are still struggling with prices of basics like food and fuel

articles.title: Strawberry Moon 2025: Is it a Micromoon? Best viewing time in Texas, Hudson Valley and other locations in US
articles.description: This years Strawberry Moon is also considered a micromoon, meaning it reaches its farthest point from Earth, known as apogee, during its orbit. Because of this distance, the full moon will appear about 14% smaller and 30% dimmer than usual.
